title: Rainy Week
alt: Rainy Mario in Super Mario Odyssey

content.html: I get super excited every time there’s rain in a game. Like a few days ago, with a brief storm during the Battle of Ostagar in Dragon Age: Origins, or a few hours ago, with this New Donk City tempest. Incidentally, it's also raining outside today, and it seems that we’re going to get an all-around cloudy week here.
Perfect for coffee, and dreaming up New York plans...
